===(_make-database_ & commands)===
====Macro====
<pre> Makes a database, like this
(make-database
  (relation :fred `[`:mary :sue`]`)
  (index :fred :mary)
  (relation :sally `[`:jen :becky`]`)
  (index :sally :jen)
  (index :sally :becky))</pre>
